content.description:
Pliny’s Inspiration

Persuades ut historiam scribam, et persuades 
non solus: multi hoc me saepe monuerunt et ego volo 
quia mihi pulchrum in primisin primis = “especially” videtur famam eorum 
extendereextendo, -ere: to increase, quibus aeternitasaeternitas, -tatis, f.: immortality debeatur.
content.question: Which of the following types of works were Pliny the Younger’s main literary production?

unit.text: 3: Pliny's Letters: Ghosts and Apparitions, Letters to Trajan and Calpurnia, and Teacher's Choice - Latin Prose

skill.text: 2.B: Describe historical and cultural contexts of Latin texts.
